param.name: Beam Timer
param.desc: Time for which decode session lasts before timing out

vdiscrete.vdescription: Very aggressive but higher misdecode rate
Aggressive
Moderate
Not aggressive
Use with very poor barcodes
Disable picklist
Decode barcode under hardware reticle
Decodes the barcode which is in the center of the image
Inverse disabled
Inverse enabled
Inverse auto

param.name: UPC EAN Supplemental Mode
param.desc: Set how supplementals should be handled

param.name: UPC EAN Random Weight Check Digit
UPC EAN RSS To UPC EAN

vdiscrete.vdescription: This setting allows the digital scanner to operate in its most aggressive state, while providing sufficient security in decoding most “in-spec” bar codes
This default setting eliminates most misdecodes
Select this option if Security level 1 fails to eliminate misdecodes
If you selected Security Level 2 and misdecodes still occur, select this security level

param.name: Decoder Code128 Enable Subtypes
param.desc: Enable other sub types besides EAN 128 and ISBT 128

vdiscrete.vdescription: This setting allows the digital scanner to operate in its most aggressive state, while providing sufficient security in decoding most “in-spec” bar codes
This default setting eliminates most misdecodes
Select this option if Security level 1 fails to eliminate misdecodes
If you selected Security Level 2 and misdecodes still occur, select this security level

param.name: Decoder Composite AB UCC Link Mode
Decoder Composite AB Use UPC Preamble Check Digit
Decoder UK Postal Report Check Digit

vdiscrete.vdescription: No code id
AIM code id
Symbol Technologies code identifier appended to the decode data

param.name: View Finder Mode

vdiscrete.vdescription: A viewfinder is not displayed during scanning
Viewfinder displayed to aid decoding
A reticle is drawn in the centre of the screen (this aids in scanning especially when picklist is enabled)

param.desc: Describes whether a viewfinder should be displayed and if a reticle drawn to aid with scanning

param.name: View Finder Feedback Mode

vdiscrete.vdescription: This mode disables any visual feedback on a successful decode
This mode displays the last image that successfully decoded. The duration for which the image is displayed can be set by the VF Feedback Time

param.desc: This parameter allows selection of the different feedback parameters on a successful decode

param.name: View Finder Feedback Time
param.desc: This parameter allows selection of the different feedback parameters on a successful decode
